data.title: Audiobook platform - Ai Code Generate Review
data.workDescription: A modern and intuitive audiobook platform designed to offer an immersive listening experience. Users can browse available titles, listen to previews, and easily control playback. The responsive layout ensures smooth usability across both mobile and desktop devices. Perfect for those who prefer the convenience of audiobooks.

data.title: Analytics Dashboard platform - Ai Code Generate Review
data.workDescription: A sleek and responsive portfolio template built for web developers to showcase projects and skills professionally. It features a clean layout, smooth animations, and dedicated sections for about, work, and contact. Designed with performance and aesthetics in mind, the template adapts well to all screen sizes, offering an engaging experience for visitors.

data.title: News platform - Ai Code Generate Review
data.workDescription: A dynamic and responsive news app that displays real-time articles across various categories. Built with a modern UI, it offers users a smooth browsing experience with intuitive navigation and clear content structure. The application showcases skills in API integration, state management, and responsive design—ideal for demonstrating front-end development capabilities.

data.title: Shop System
data.workDescription: Project to bring NgRx (Redux) State Management concept in place. For that I will implement a Shop System, with its main functionalities like cards, cart, products list, etc. This is a hands on project.

data.title: Barber App
data.workDescription: Barber Application with features for Clients looking for barbershop and Barbers to show their work and have a schedule by a Client. Built with Angular, RxJS. There's also a Node.js Back end, also on my Github.

data.title: Pokédex
data.workDescription: Pokédex app, utilizing top Angular tools. It was used in this project Module and Component Architecures, Lazy loading, Jest Unit Test, State Management, Reactive Programming, Modal with unique routes, etc.

data.title: gRPC Login API
data.workDescription: This is a gRPC API with Typescript in a Node.Js application by building a basic auth service. gRPC is a technology for implementing RPC APIs that uses HTTP 2.0 as its underlying transport protocol.

data.title: Api Call Debouce
data.workDescription: In order to improve the performance of your Angular, Rxjs provides some nice operators to help us working with data stream. debounceTime() is one of those operators that save us to write a custom JavaScript code yet improves the code readability, performance and fluidity. This project has the goal to implement a debounceTime Rxjs operator in a input search, where it sends an GET request to an API at debouce time.
